title: Debonair Azir
body:
http://pre11.deviantart.net/7028/th/pre/i/2015/086/0/a/skin_concept___debonair_azir_by_demikiev-d8ncjwk.png

Tuxedo > Penguin > Bird > Azir > Emperor > Penguin
EMPEROR PENGUIN GEDDIT RITO?

replies.body:
I know just where to fit the monocle folks:

His towers.

> [{quoted}](name=Keagn,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-24T14:28:04.425+0000)
>
> I know just where to fit the monocle folks:
> 
> His towers.

As in the body would be just a flying suit and the "Disk" part of it would be a floating monacle?

> [{quoted}](name=MasterCorgi,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-07-24T18:10:18.774+0000)
>
> As in the body would be just a flying suit and the "Disk" part of it would be a floating monacle?

Yesiree. It works thematically too, it could focus the sun's energy like a magnifying glass and shoot streams of dapper light.

> [{quoted}](name=Keagn,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-07-24T18:14:18.168+0000)
>
> Yesiree. It works thematically too, it could focus the sun's energy like a magnifying glass and shoot streams of *dapper light*.

Fucking brilliant! Riot please you have to make this skin!

> [{quoted}](name=MasterCorgi,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-24T18:16:43.705+0000)
>
> Fucking brilliant! Riot please you have to make this skin!

Thank you, thank you ^_^

And yes, Rito plz, my money and virgin goats await.
Hey that's pretty classy! I really like the use of elements from Ezreal and Vi to solve his magical elements.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-24T07:33:35.845+0000)
>
> Hey that's pretty classy! I really like the use of elements from Ezreal and Vi to solve his magical elements.

http://i.imgur.com/SF8MzIP.gif

this is what all us fiora players want{{champion:114}} 

http://imgur.com/IXG1FEv

Needs to look more like The Penguin, for /Joke reasons.

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11120/111201789/4474250-7132681563-the_p.jpg

Possibly add fur coat?
& monocle. I hear they're all the **rage** these days.
Penguin hasn't always been depicted with a fur coat though, so that's not really required.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilMerodach,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-24T14:10:26.041+0000)

> Possibly add fur coat?
> & monocle. I hear they're all the **rage** these days.

Might go against the Debonair Style needs to look like Debonair Vi, Ezreal, Jayce.

> [{quoted}](name=MasterCorgi,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xw2EZVVB,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-24T14:20:22.649+0000)
>
> Might go against the Debonair Style.

Maybe gold trimmed other than black?
Might be drifting to Gentleman skin line though.
But still...THE  /JOKE !!

>

> Might be drifting to Gentleman skin line though.
> But still...THE  /JOKE !!

Might work yeah!

Darn, someone already did it XD
I was thinking of His soldiers being body guards XD
That's dope. I would total love to have a whole debonair team with Azir on it seems fitting, since he is an emperor.
